languages.text: "Кровь святых, я вырву тебе глотку собственными руками!"
"Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
languages.original_text: "Кровь святых, я вырву тебе глотку собственными руками!"

traits.locale_text: "Grox seed, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Grox seed, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Grox seed, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Grox seed, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Grox seed, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Par le sang des saints, je vais vous étrangler de mes propres mains ! »
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: « Foutre de grox, je vais vous étrangler de mes propres mains ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “圣人之血在上！我要亲手扯开你的喉咙！”
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: “格洛克斯生出来的孽种！我要亲手扯开你的喉咙！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「この野郎、この手でお前の喉を引き裂いてやる！」
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: 「この野郎、この手でお前の喉を引き裂いてやる！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Beim Blut der Heiligen, mit meinen eigenen Händen werde ich Euch die Kehle rausreißen!"
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Grox-Samen, mit meinen eigenen Händen werde ich Euch die Kehle rausreißen!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Por la sangre de los santos, te arrancaré la garganta con mis propias manos!».
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Excremento de grox, te arrancaré la garganta con mis propias manos!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Azizlerin kanı aşkına... Senin gırtlağını bizzat kendi ellerimle keseceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Saints' blood, I will rip out your throat with my own hands!"

traits.locale_text: "Azizlerin kanı aşkına... Senin gırtlağını bizzat kendi ellerimle keseceğim!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
